verbs.description: mangonize (third-person singular simple present mangonizes, present participle mangonizing, simple past and past participle mangonized)

entries.meaning: (transitive, obsolete) To refurbish or make to appear more attractive.
examples: What little seems to be authentic history is easily told; nor are, for our present purpose, of much value the legends, which mangonize the life of Buddha. They will be found in every book that treats of the subject, [...]
